appShortcutName: Google Workspace Sync™ for Microsoft Outlook®
appDisplayName: Google Workspace Sync™ for Microsoft Outlook®
description:
GWSMO is a plugin that allows users to synchronize mail, calendar events, contacts, notes, and tasks between their new Google Account and Outlook.


What's fixed
- Fixed a problem that caused the error "The Google Workspace sync operation failed. Please try again after reinstalling Microsoft Outlook or Contact your system administrator" when users try to configure a GWSMO profile using the Set up a Google Workspace Sync User option.
